title: Cavendish Survives Tour’s Highest Climb, Démare Raced Entire Stage Alone Only to Be Time Cut
content:
The race jury extended the 'hors délai', but it wasn't enough to save French sprinter Démare who raced over the Tour's highest climb all alone: 'I'm not the type to give up.'

Read the full article at Cavendish Survives Tour’s Highest Climb, Démare Raced Entire Stage Alone Only to Be Time Cut on Velo.
author: ahood
